name: #SheReadsTruth logo journal
description: UPDATE: less than 15 journals left! And we are so sorry, but no custom names can be added at this time. Thank you! Red 5"x8.1" 240 pages, ruled Hard cover 80 GSM wood-free, acid-free paper Journal is laser etched with the #SheReadsTruth logo on the front. Customize it for an additional $8 with your name, favorite scripture reference - anything up to 25 characters. Journal has an expandable interior pocket for keeping important papers or emergency cash. The satin bookmark ribbon does not easily fray, and the elastic closure keeps your notebook tightly secured wherever you go. NOTE: If you choose the "add name" option: 1. log in to PayPal at checkout 2. click "add" in the note to seller section just beneath your mailing address 3. enter the text that you want etched onto your journal between brackets. (for example, if your name is Jessi Connolly, write something like: "please write [jessi connolly] on my journal. thanks!")

name: donate a journal
description: [Order by Thursday, December 13th for Christmas delivery. After that, ordering will remain open, but nothing will ship until after Christmas.] Want to donate a journal to a #SheReadsTruth community member who may not be able to buy one for herself? That's great - thank you! Just add as many journals to your cart as you'd like to donate and check out as usual. Also, if you choose the "add name" option, the recipient of your gift will get to tell us what they'd like etched on the front. **Journals will ship in November. Please contact us with questions! hello@SheReadsTruth.com**
